backend/main.mo: Core chat canister implementing rooms, message storage, posting, editing, fetching, and nicknames with blob media support.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining actor state shapes and a no-op migration returning the previous state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping product features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Compiled list of short summaries for all frontend files describing their responsibilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH theme tokens and light/dark CSS variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling theme, routing between lobby and room views, and footer visibility logic.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Dropdown theme switcher using next-themes with light/dark/system options.
frontend/src/features/chat/components/Me: Message composer with text, file attachment, paste handling, upload progress, and message submission via mutation.
Renders a chat message with editing, deletion, media display, reactions, and optimistic status handling.
frontend/src/features/chat/reactions/Rea: Displays reaction buttons and emoji picker, sending reactions via mutation.
frontend/src/features/chat/RoomPage.tsx: Chat room UI showing messages, composing, validation states, background syncing, and reply resolution.
frontend/src/features/chat/types/chatMes: Defines ChatMessage with optimistic fields and helper types plus a guard for optimistic messages.
frontend/src/features/chat/utils/display: Returns a safe display name using nickname or fallback to Anonymous.
frontend/src/features/chat/utils/downloa: Helpers for triggering downloads and deriving file extensions from MIME types.
frontend/src/features/chat/utils/message: Parses backend or network errors into userâ€‘friendly messages.
Provides sorting and merging logic for chat messages with optimistic handling.
frontend/src/features/lobby/EditNickname: Inline nickname editor with save, cancel, and clear actions using toast feedback.
frontend/src/features/lobby/LobbyPage.ts: Lobby UI for nickname setup, room creation/joining, and error handling using backend mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, managing login, stored identities, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalProfile.ts: Stores a generated userId and optional nickname in localStorage with setters for updating profile info.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines react-query hooks for rooms, messages, and message posting, using the backend actor with caching and optimistic updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light/dark mode, including chat bubble colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, react-query, InternetIdentityProvider, and global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors bound to CSS variables, plugins, and layout settings.
project_state.json: Describes project metadata, features, issues, and architectural notes for the anonymous chat app.
